channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Indicator is Still Flashing Green
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Even though the Nasdaq slipped a bit yesterday, I saw something very bullish beneath the surface. The New New Highs indicator p...

item.title: Institutional Money Still on the Sidelines
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Global fund managers still haven’t bought into this rally. Despite the sharp rebound in U.S. stocks, the latest data shows they...

item.title: Was This Recovery “Too Fast”?
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The Nasdaq just rallied 20% off its April lows—in exactly 23 trading days. That’s got a lot of folks screaming “too fast” and “...

item.title: Still Too Many Bears Left
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Nearly 60% of S&P 500 stocks just hit 20-day highs—a clear sign of short-term strength. But here’s the part that really matters...
